TestInformation.Title: VKMark
TestInformation.Description: VKMark is a collection of Vulkan tests/benchmarks.
TestInformation.PreInstallMessage: Some external dependencies needed for this test are may not be currently covered by the Phoronix Test Suite - depending upon distribution/version. You might need to manually install those packages; on an Ubuntu system it would be - sudo apt install libvulkan-dev libglm-dev libassimp-dev libxcb1-dev libxcb-icccm4-dev libwayland-dev libdrm-dev libgbm-dev.

TestProfile.SystemDependencies: /usr/share/pkgconfig/wayland-protocols.pc, vulkan/vk_icd.h, glm/simd/common.h, assimp/Defines.h, xcb/xcb.h, xcb/xcb_icccm.h, wayland-client.h, libdrm/drm.h, gbm.h
